posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

pages.title: Curriculum Vitae
pages.text: EducationUniversity of Bristol, Phd Student, 2022.03 - nowUniversity of Bristol, Master of Science by Research, 2020.11 - 2022.03Research InterestsMy reseach is in Natural Language Processing (NLP). I focus on reducing hallucinations in summaries and improving the faithfulness/factuality of summarisation models. Current neural summariser has achieved significant success in generating fluent summaries, but sometimes the summariser degenerates to a language model and makes up false facts, which makes the summary less applicable in practice. I am interested in how to avoid this degeneration for summrisers and how to enable the summariser to detect and correct the hallucinations automatically. ServicesEMNLP Conference ReviewerAACL Conference Reviewer
